input.sentences: i was drinking some liquor the other night feeling pretty tipsy | so i decided to amble back to my apartment .
the building was decorated in christmas lights | so it was like a beacon to guide me in .
all of the sudden | i started feeling dizzy . the lights started spinning over my head !
i came to in front of another building | not sure how i got there !
i decided to duck into the closest bar | ordered a water | and waited till i felt more sober .
output.sentences: Sitting alone waiting for my friends to show up as usual.
I started to get bored so I took a walk.
The city was full of lights and color.
I am not often in this part of town.
When I am I always have to stop at my favorite restaurant.
